definition: having human form or attributes as opposed to those of animals or divine beings, any living or extinct member of the family Hominidae characterized by superior intelligence, articulate speech, and erect carriage
details:
adjective
- having human form or attributes as opposed to those of animals or divine beings
= example: having human form or attributes as opposed to those of animals or divine beings
- characteristic of humanity
= example: characteristic of humanity
- relating to a person
= example: relating to a person
noun
- any living or extinct member of the family Hominidae characterized by superior intelligence, articulate speech, and erect carriage
= synonyms: homo, man, human being
